name: Couscous Salad with Tomato and Basil
author: cpoko
summary: This is a super-easy, great tasting salad that can be served hot or cold. The balsamic vinegar and feta add great flavor. You can also add chopped chicken breasts to make it a complete meal.
ingredients: 1 (14.5 ounce) can fat-free, reduced-sodium chicken broth
⅓ cup thinly sliced fresh basil
directions: Mix 1 tablespoon olive oil and garlic in a large microwave-safe bowl; heat on high until fragrant, about 45 seconds
Add chicken broth and heat on high until simmering, about 4 minutes
Cover and let stand until liquid is absorbed, about 5 minutes
Stir tomato, basil, vinegar, salt, and black pepper into couscous; drizzle with remaining 1 tablespoon olive oil and sprinkle with feta cheese
